name: Text Vector Embeddings
description: Enables the storage, updating, and deletion of issue comment embeddings.

dedupeMatchThreshold.description: The minimum similarity score when considering existing issues to be duplicates.

dedupeWarningThreshold.description: Issues above this similarity score will be marked as a potential duplicate.

annotateThreshold.description: The minimum similarity score for including similar issues as annotations in the comment footnotes.

jobMatchingThreshold.description: The minimum similarity score when considering users to be suitable for a job.

alwaysRecommend.description: If set to a value greater than 0, the bot will always recommend contributors, regardless of the similarity score.

demoFlag.description: When true, disables storing issues and comments in the database.
